Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.builders

Class FormViewInitializer

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.builders.FormViewInitializer
@Component public final class FormViewInitializer extends Object
Configures a blank EntityViewFactoryBuilder for the a generic form view.
Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

    • createViewPropertyRegistry

      protected EntityPropertyRegistry createViewPropertyRegistry(EntityConfiguration entityConfiguration)
      Create a new property registry for a view. This applies a suffix to the entity configuration registry id which will be replaced with the view name inside the builders.
